metadata.dc:author: Alejo, M
León, X
Lacasta, A
Burges, J
Quer, M
Oliva, E
Vega, J M
Esteller, E
metadata.dc:description: The synovial sarcomas constitute the 7-10% of the soft tissue malign tumors, with a preferred location in the limbs. In the head and neck a 5% of the totality are placed. We present one case of retropharyngeal synovial sarcoma and the accomplished treatment, together with a revision of the bibliography.
metadata.dc:title: Sarcoma sinovial retrofaríngeo.
[A retropharyngeal synovial sarcoma].
